akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5653. Transferred Editorial Notes Codification Section 5653 was editorially reclassified as section 11143 of Title 34, Crime Control and Law Enforcement.
Prior ProvisionsA prior section 5653, Pub. L. 93–415, title II, § 243, Sept. 7, 1974, 88 Stat. 1126; Pub. L. 95–115, §§ 3(a)(3)(B), 5(b), Oct. 3, 1977, 91 Stat. 1048, 1057; Pub. L. 98–473, title II, § 632, Oct. 12, 1984, 98 Stat. 2118; Pub. L. 100–690, title VII, § 7261, Nov. 18, 1988, 102 Stat. 4442; Pub. L. 102–586, § 2(g)(3), Nov. 4, 1992, 106 Stat. 4995, related to research, demonstration, and evaluation, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 107–273, div. C, title II, § 12210(1), Nov. 2, 2002, 116 Stat. 1880.
